Name: Rossini Spritz
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Fraise des Bois liqueur
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: POUR prosecco and Rossini mix into glass. ADD ice. Top with soda.
Review: Perhaps best described as a Strawberry Bellini, sweet strawberry flavours are tamed with the gentle acidity of Prosecco.
History: Created in 2013 by yours truly for Jamie's Italian Bars. See Spritz cocktail history and more recipes
Nutrition: One serving of Rossini Spritz contains 149 calories
